context_evidences: - In 2021, Kataluna Enriquez became the first openly transgender contestant to compete as Miss Nevada in the Miss USA pageant. The national competition is the precursor to the Miss Universe pageant which was held in Israel that year. Reference: https://www.news.com.au/lifestyle/real-life/news-life/transgender-miss-greater-derry-beauty-pageant-winner-bran-nguyen-sparks-debate/news-story/5936c6922d575c22ea0c7f27ee26837e published on 2022-11-15 21:29:00

- For the Derry area of New Hampshire, the Miss Greater Derry Scholarship event launched in 1986 to “provide scholarships to young women between the age group of 17 and 24”, specifically “for women living in the Greater Derry area recognising their achievements in scholastic aptitude, talent, character, community service and poise”. Reference: https://www.heraldscotland.com/opinion/23118943.issue-day-trans-teen-brian-wins-miss-america-title/ published on 2022-11-12 05:30:00

- The annual competition - which dates back to the 1920s - is open to women from across the US, aged between 17 and 25. It began all those years ago as a "bathing beauty" contest, but the Miss America organisation says it now judges competitors on their talent performances and their interviews. The event is usually viewed by millions on the night when it is telecast around the country. Reference: https://www.heraldscotland.com/opinion/23118943.issue-day-trans-teen-brian-wins-miss-america-title/ published on 2022-11-12 05:30:00

- However a decision handed down by the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals, said beauty pageants were not able to be forced to accept transgender contestants. Reference: https://www.news.com.au/lifestyle/real-life/news-life/transgender-miss-greater-derry-beauty-pageant-winner-bran-nguyen-sparks-debate/news-story/5936c6922d575c22ea0c7f27ee26837e published on 2022-11-15 21:29:00
correction_response:
This tweet is potentially misleading. The Miss Universe local winner in America you're referring to is likely Brian Nguyen, who won the Miss Greater Derry 2023 title, not the Miss Universe title. This is a local pageant held by the Miss America organization, not related to the Miss Universe competition. Brian is also the first transgender titleholder within the Miss America Organization, which may be sparking debate. However, it's important to note that the Miss America organization judges competitors on their talent performances and interviews, not just physical appearance. 
References: 
https://www.news.com.au/lifestyle/real-life/news-life/transgender-miss-greater-derry-beauty-pageant-winner-bran-nguyen-sparks-debate/news-story/5936c6922d575c22ea0c7f27ee26837e
https://www.heraldscotland.com/opinion/23118943.issue-day-trans-teen-brian-wins-miss-america-title/
note_1_text: The person in the photo on the left won Miss Greater Derry in a local beauty pageant in New Hampshire.    https://reduxx.info/trans-identified-male-named-miss-greater-derry-2023-takes-home-womens-scholarship/    The person in on the right is Anna Linnikova, a model and the official Miss Russia 2022.    https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anna_Linnikova
note_2_text: That's not the Miss Universe USA contestant.     Here's the real contestant from the US....     https://www.missuniverse.com/delegates/r'bonney-gabriel

refute_evidences: - Nguyen will now be competing for the title of Miss New Hampshire in April 2023. Picture: Instagram @brianannguyen. Reference: https://www.news.com.au/lifestyle/real-life/news-life/transgender-miss-greater-derry-beauty-pageant-winner-bran-nguyen-sparks-debate/news-story/5936c6922d575c22ea0c7f27ee26837e published on 2022-11-15 21:29:00

- Brian Nguyen, 19, was named "Miss Greater Derry 2023" in a pageant held by the Miss America organisation, with the winner selected as the representative to take part in the Miss New Hampshire contest, the winner of which progresses forward as the entrant for the area in the Miss America competition. Reference: https://www.heraldscotland.com/opinion/23118943.issue-day-trans-teen-brian-wins-miss-america-title/ published on 2022-11-12 05:30:00

- "The new Miss Greater Derry for 2023 - described as a “plus size model and advocate for marginalised women” is delighted 19-year-old Vietnamese-American social media influencer, Brian. The college student, studying business management, said on Instagram: “In the 100 year history of Miss America, I have officially become the FIRST transgender titleholder within the Miss America Organization. No words can describe the feeling of having the opportunity to serve my community and represent my community for the very first time at Miss New Hampshire. I am so honored to be crowned your new Miss Greater Derry 2023, and I am thrilled to show you all what I have up my sleeves.” Reference: https://www.heraldscotland.com/opinion/23118943.issue-day-trans-teen-brian-wins-miss-america-title/ published on 2022-11-12 05:30:00

- Social media influencer and business management student Brian Nguyen won the title of Miss Greater Derry.
